item.title: How can i add stalls 667/704
item.dc:creator: @MyRsPs MyRsPs
item.description:
@MyRsPs wrote:

[quote=“martje, post:1, topic:438149”]i added like food stallb ut if i click i get notting how can i put a amount of cash on it???
and XP thanks

Post code here plz[/quote]

Do you need to Spawn an object? If yes go to NPCSpawning.Java and search for “Object Custom Add”.
Im sure you can work it out from there. good luck

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add stalls 667/704
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“martje, post:1, topic:438149”]i added like food stallb ut if i click i get notting how can i put a amount of cash on it???
and XP thanks

Post code here plz[/quote]

“Post code here plz”

You won’t do anything if you want us to just give you the answer. I’ll do my best to point you in the right direction, but I’m not going to spoonfeed you. You’re a bright individual and independent thought is encouraged on this site.

OT: When you’re clicking things, whether it be objects, items, npcs, etc. You’re sending a packet. Most servers feature a print to the console for players with a rank of an owner, as default. So, if you haven’t already found the stalls Id, that’s your first step.

Once you have the Id of this particular stall, you’re going to want to make it do something. Does your server have any content regarding thieving? I’m going to assume it does and continue onwards.

So, find out how your server handles firstClickObjects and copy another case (I’m not sure how higher revision servers handle it.)

Read full topic
